sense.def:
Kadar nekaj nezaželenega
persists
, obstaja še naprej.

seg.quote: The pain persisted until the morning.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
persists in doing something
, tisto dela še naprej, čeprav je težavno ali čeprav mu drugi nasprotujejo.

seg.quote: People still persist in thinking that standards are going down.
He persisted with his policy of conciliation.
‘And what,’ persisted Casson, ‘is to prevent us?’
